# Meta Data: Data Dictionary 

This file describes the variables, fields, or columns of the raw data. We are using scraping from a database online, credit to Jeff Sackmann for providing the data for use. We are using his Github account, https://github.com/JeffSackmann and going through the csv files in https://github.com/JeffSackmann/tennis_atp. 

Data Directory:

The player file columns are player_id, first_name, last_name, hand, birth_date, country_code.
The columns for the ranking files are ranking_date, ranking, player_id, ranking_points.
